Plot: A recently laid off factory worker kidnaps his former boss' daughter, hoping to use the ransom money to pay for his sister's kidney transplant.
Title: Sympathy for Mr. Vengeance
Writer: Jae-sun Lee, Jong-yong Lee, Mu-yeong Lee, Chan-wook Park
Actors: Kang-ho Song, Ha-kyun Shin, Doona Bae, Ji-Eun Lim
tomatoConsensus: Though Park directs with stylistic flair, this revenge thriller is more excessively gruesome than thrilling.
